text: Channel (Major Feature): Add Members to a Channel at any point in its history (now or past date). Can also be changed later.
Channel Info: Added new button to connect directly with other Members.
PDF Annotations: Share annotations with Members, even if you are not connected.
PDF Search: Faster performance on large PDFs.
Visioconference: Enhanced Green Frame sensitivity & noise filtering.
Company / Discover: Show or hide your Contacts preference is now remembered across devices.
UX/UI: General improvements across the entire app (Rights Management, File Info, etc.)
